shape_0_per_frame1=r=q5*10;
shape_0_per_frame2=x=0.5+0.3*sin(r);

shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000

shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000

shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=
per_frame_2=wave_r = wave_r + 0.350*( 0.60*sin(3.980*time) + 0.40*sin(11.047*time) );
per_frame_3=wave_g = wave_g + 0.350*( 0.60*sin(0.835*time) + 0.40*sin(1.081*time) );
per_frame_4=wave_b = wave_b + 0.350*( 0.60*sin(0.814*time) + 0.40*sin(1.011*time) );
per_frame_5=//cx = cx + 0.110*( 0.60*sin(0.374*time) + 0.40*sin(0.294*time) );
per_frame_6=//cy = cy + 0.110*( 0.60*sin(0.393*time) + 0.40*sin(0.223*time) );
per_frame_7=dx = dx + 0.005*( 0.60*sin(0.173*time) + 0.40*sin(0.223*time) );
per_frame_8=//decay = decay - 0.01*equal(frame%20,0);
per_frame_9=//wave_x = 0.5 + 0.25*cos(time*2)/aspecty;
per_frame_10=//wave_y = 0.5 + 0.25*sin(time*2)/aspectx;
per_frame_11=coc=pow(abs(oldb-bass),abs(oldt-treb));
per_frame_12=//coc=pow(abs(coc-oldcoc),1);
per_frame_13=coc=coc+abs(mid-oldm)*0.3;
per_frame_14=ang = time*2;
per_frame_15=q1 = cos(ang);
per_frame_16=q2 = sin(ang);
per_frame_17=oldb=bass;
per_frame_18=oldt=treb;
per_frame_19=oldm=mid;
per_frame_20=zoom=zoom+coc*0.02;
per_frame_21=q5=coc;//above(coc,1)+below(coc,1)*coc+equal(coc,1);
per_frame_22=monitor=q5;
per_frame_23=//we need to
per_frame_24=coca=coca+if(above(coc,coca),coc,-coca*0.01);
per_frame_25=monitor=coca;
per_frame_26=//rot=sin(coca*2)*0.1;
per_frame_27=coca=if(above(coca,5000),4900,coca);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // PAINTERLY EFFECT:
warp_4=`    float2 t = 0.005 + 0.045*(float2(bass,q5)-1);
warp_5=`    float2 uv2 = uv;
warp_6=`    float2 delta2 = texsize.zw*float2(1,1);
warp_7=`    float3 blurry_color = tex2D( sampler_main, 
warp_8=`        lerp(uv,uv_orig,-1) + delta2 ).xyz;
warp_9=`    float2 v = (blurry_color.xy-0.37) * t;
warp_10=`      //uv2 += v;
warp_11=`      // instead, add a rotated version:
warp_12=`      uv2.x += v.x*q1 + v.y*q2;
warp_13=`      uv2.y += v.x*q2 - v.y*q1;
warp_14=`
warp_15=`    // sample previous frame
warp_16=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv2 ).xyz;
warp_17=`//flower fx:
warp_18=`delta2+=q5.xx*0.01;
warp_19=`float3 a=GetBlur1(uv-float2(delta2.x,0));
warp_20=`float3 b=GetBlur1(uv+float2(delta2.x,0));    
warp_21=`float3 c=GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,delta2.y));
warp_22=`float3 d=GetBlur1(uv+float2(0,delta2.y));
warp_23=`float3 dx=abs(a-b);
warp_24=`float3 dy=abs(c-d);
warp_25=`ret=lerp(ret*1.2,(dx+dy),0.2);
warp_26=`ret*=1-pow(((0+dx)*(1+dy)),4)*67;  
warp_27=`  // darken over time
warp_28=`    //ret -= 0.1*(0.5-tex2D(sampler_noise_lq,uv*9*rand_frame.xy));    
warp_29=`    ret -= 0.01;
warp_30=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`/*
comp_4=`ret=GetBlur1(uv);
comp_5=`ret+=GetBlur1(float2(uv.x+ret.x,uv.y+ret.y));
comp_6=`ret+=GetBlur1(float2(uv.x-ret.y,uv.y-ret.y));
comp_7=`ret=pow(length(ret)*ret*1.33,0.89-GetBlur3(uv));
comp_8=`//ret=saturate(ret);
comp_9=`//ret*=tex2D(sampler_noise_lq,uv*ret.y);
comp_10=`ret*=ret.z;
comp_11=`*/
comp_12=`ret=GetBlur1(uv);
comp_13=`ret=3*(ret-GetPixel(uv));
comp_14=`float3 orb=ret/(lum(ret)+1);
comp_15=`ret=pow(pow(ret,1+orb),1+q5);
comp_16=`ret+=GetPixel(uv)-0.1;
comp_17=`}
